text:
Hello there.
Did anyone had problem with verifying security signature on custom action from CRM Extension card? I believe I’m doing everything according to docummentation and what is important, it works for other GET requests as well as for POST.
What we are trying to do is to associate contact with deal.

We retrieved data from request for debugging purpose and at first glance it all looks fine.

Is there maybe a place in HubSpot where can I check what was send to 3rd party API?
Can anyone assist in solving that problem? thx

Hi Does anyone know how to customize the design of the social icons and make sure that it is aligned together with the header tab when the page is scrolled down? Kindly advise on this.
Current Problem: This page was built with HubSpot (Refer to Pic1)
<https://blog.roseattractions.com/>
 
Expected Result: This page was built with wordpress (Refer to Pic2)
<https://www.roseattractions.com/contact-us>
